definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: Interference with the normal production of heme or globin leads to anemia.
sentences.chinese: 血紅素或球蛋白的正常產生收到干擾會導致貧血。

sentences.english: Objective To study the biological activity of human SARS-specific immunoglobulin.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究人SARS特異性免疫球蛋白的生物學活性。

sentences.english: Usually, the plasma cells are differentiated enough to retain the function of immunoglobulin production.
sentences.chinese: 通常漿細胞分化成熟，具有產生免疫球蛋白的功能。

sentences.english: In conclusion, we confirm the efficacy of long-term HBIG immunoprophylaxis.
sentences.chinese: 結論是我們確認了長期接種乙肝免疫球蛋白的療效。

sentences.english: Cryoglobulinemia in association with hypocomplementemia usually indicates presence of renal damage.
sentences.chinese: 冷球蛋白血癥並低補體血癥常有臨牀腎臟損害。

sentences.english: Tropomyosin is further made up of three subunits.
sentences.chinese: 肌球蛋白是進一步彌補了三個分部。

sentences.english: By this means, receptors can transport immunoglobulins across epithelial cells.
sentences.chinese: 通過這種方式，受體能穿過上皮細胞傳輸免疫球蛋白。

sentences.english: Con A agglutination test was positive in the three treatments making an identification of cell transformation effect.
sentences.chinese: 刀豆球蛋白A凝集試驗進一步驗證了細胞轉化結果。

sentences.english: No change was found in muscle myosin fiber-type composition.
sentences.chinese: 肌球蛋白纖維類型組成沒有發現有改變。

sentences.english: The cloning and expression of the gene encoding S japonicum tropomyosin had been successfully made.
sentences.chinese: 日本血吸蟲原肌球蛋白編碼基因克隆和原核表達成功。

sentences.english: Myosin motors can be attached to the surface of a glass slide.
sentences.chinese: 肌球蛋白馬達可附着在載玻片表面。

sentences.english: Serum protein electrophoresis demonstrated a spike in immunoglobulin A (IgA) lambda chains.
sentences.chinese: 血清蛋白質電泳顯示免疫球蛋白A輕鏈的高度表現。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, serum levels of immunoglobulins and interleukins were tested.
sentences.chinese: 同時檢測血清免疫球蛋白及白細胞介素。

sentences.english: Virus translocation was also reduced in the presence of HBV immunoglobulin.
sentences.chinese: 乙肝免疫球蛋白的存在也減少了病毒的轉運。

sentences.english: When ATP is added, the myosin motors move the actin filaments.
sentences.chinese: 加入ATP後，肌球蛋白馬達使微絲移動。

sentences.english: Its histopathology is characterized by subepidermal blister and the deposition of immunoglobulin in direct immunofluorescence(DIF).
sentences.chinese: 直接免疫熒光示基底膜帶免疫球蛋白沉積。

definition: potency/titer (measure of effective concentration in virology or chemical pathology, defined in terms of potency after dilution by titration)/valence (perceived value in psychology)/valency
